TopicTitle: Disable on-screen messages? Disable green part hover-overlay?

Articles.Content:
1. Is there a mod that disables the onscreen-messages when all the other GUI elements are hidden as well (F2 toggle)?

Messages and displays like "time-warp: 1x" and "Grab" keep ruining my screenshots

2. Is there a way to disable the green part overlay in flight mode? Same reason as above, would make it easier to create videos/screenshots.

good idea!

or maybe something that allow to take screenshot and record video without all the overlays (but in keeping it visible for the player).
